name: Light Switch Crusader
description:
In Light Switch Crusader, you play as a man distraught with contempt for people who waste electricity. So what do you do in this moody stealth comedy, you help people out the only way you know how... ONE LIGHT AT A TIME...

Enjoy! WASD for movement. Hold SPACEBAR to sneak. Pressing ESC at any time closes the game. Thanks for playing!

Give the web player a second to load please... full screen is funky, there are two different buttons, I recommend the blue one.

Made in exactly 72 hours for Ludum Dare 39  , programming and design by Ibinary, art, design, and menu song by Rik (WAV) Oclon, game music by IndieManiac.

Ludum Dare developers:  rate here 

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/light-switch-crusader

Developer notes:

That glitchy TV was ok on the windows build, now for some reason the meshes are fighting to render, probably too close together.  The game will be improved after voting. We will add more ambient light. tighten the controls. we are going to lose the slow mo when you lose. A few cosmetic touches here and there. 

THANKS FOR PLAYING!!!
